#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>

using namespace std;

int N,M;
char board[102][102];

int inrange(int x , int y)
{
	if(x < 0 || x > N) return 0;
	if(y < 0 || y > M) return 0;
	return 1;
}

char checkmines(int x , int y)
{
	int count = 0;
	for(int i = x-1 ; i <= x+1 ; i++)
		for(int j = y-1 ; j <= y+1 ; j++)
		{
			if(inrange(i,j))
				if(board[i][j] == '*') count++;
		}
	return (char(count) + '0');
}

int main()
{
	int count = 1;
	while(scanf("%d%d",&N,&M) != EOF)
	{
		if(N == 0 && M == 0) break;
		for(int i = 0 ; i < N ; i++) scanf("%s",board[i]);
		for(int i = 0 ; i < N ; i++)
			for(int j = 0 ; j < M ; j++)
				if(board[i][j] != '*') board[i][j] = checkmines(i , j);
		printf("Field #%d:\n",count++);
		for(int i = 0 ; i < N ; i++)
		{
			for(int j = 0 ; j < M ; j++) printf("%c",board[i][j]);
			printf("\n");
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
